inputs.body:
SigninLogs
| where UserId == '@{items('For_each_8')?['userid']}'
| extend Result = 
    case(
        ResultType == 0, "Success",
        ResultType == 50074, "Interrupted",
        "Failure"
    )
| extend Locatie = strcat(parse_json(LocationDetails).city, ", ", parse_json(LocationDetails).countryOrRegion)
| project TijdLokaal = format_datetime(datetime_utc_to_local(CreatedDateTime, 'Europe/Brussels'), 'dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm'), User = UserDisplayName, App = AppDisplayName, Result, Code = ResultType, IP = IPAddress, Locatie
| sort by TijdLokaal
| take 20
